# Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
data <- read_csv("data/JO2.csv", show_col_types = FALSE, skip = 1)
```

```{r}
head(data)
# first row looks incorrectly imported ----> fix it (header row?)
```

```{r}

data_long <- data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -Subject,   # dont need subject col
    names_to = "Condition",
    values_to = "JO2"
  )

data_long <- data_long %>%
  separate(Condition, into = c("Substrate", "Dose"), sep = "_")


data_long <- data_long %>%
  mutate(
    Genotype = if_else(str_detect(Subject, "^NT"), "NT", "Tg")
  )

data_long <- data_long %>%
  drop_na(JO2)

```
